channel.title: Server ip?
channel.description: where do i set my ip. some sourcesa utomatically do it. this one doesnt, it sets it to 127.0.0.1 (0.0.0.0) how do i change it to my ip?

item.title: Server ip?
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

What Liquid Magic Said. Except you can also try IP or Server, even though those are likely to bring up many results.

Read full topic

item.title: Server ip?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“thunderflea, post:1, topic:339868”]where do i set my ip. some sourcesa utomatically do it. this one doesnt, it sets it to 127.0.0.1 (0.0.0.0)
how do i change it to my ip?[/quote]
If you have a client with GUI.java, it’s in there.

If not, open your client files and look for client.java, search for whatever ip it connects to and change it to the ip you want.

Note, it may require to do this several times, so keep searching for 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0, I recommend searching for both.

Read full topic
